job title: Mid-Level Python Developer - Data Science, Big Data
job description:
You are a motivated person who wants to use your technical skills to do more than just create cool websites. The application you will be working on will help make great strides in the advancement of medical solutions. You will also be able to hone your skills, and launch pad your career to wherever you choice.

This is a full time role that can pay up to 100k per year.

Required Skills & Experience
  • 2-4 years of experience developing in Python
  • Experience with a modern framework like Djano or Flask
  • Have an understanding of big data tools like Hadoop, or Splunk
  • Experience with the Python Data Science stack: SciPy, NumPy, and Pandas
    • Desired Skills & Experience
  • BS/MS inputer Science or related field
  • Experience with other languages like Java, Scala, Clojure, or Go
    • What You Will Be Doing

    Tech Breakdown
  • 100% Green field Development
    • Daily Responsibilities
  • 80% Hands On
  • 20% Team Collaboration
    • The Offer

  • Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance
  • 401(k) 3% match
  • Paid Sick Time Leave

  • Casual Dress Code
